text: Choose the correct statement from the following;

options.a: Unisexual flowers possess only one type of essential floral whorls
options.b: A typical flower in dicots always possess one type of accessory floral whorls and two type of essential floral whorls
options.c: Bisexual flowers always possess indistinct accessory organs

hint: A complete flower has all four whorls; unisexual flowers lack one essential whorl.
